Title: Cottage Inn Pizza Ann Arbor Stadium
Address: 2301 W Stadium Blvd, Ann Arbor, MI 48103
Description: Long-running Midwestern chain serving deep-dish & thin-crust pizzas, plus subs, salads & more.

summary.snippet: "A local pizza legend, everything from deep dish, standard round, sides and more."
"Hire better employees and offer the service I expect for a 23$ pizza!"
"Loving the $7 meal deal staff super friendly and the pizza is always great"

most_relevant.description: Getting it hot and dining in was the best choice. We spent roughly $38 and some change on cheese bread and a half and half pizza which was traditional pep and supreme w/o mushroom. The cheese bread was so stringy and was ok, not as flavorful as it could have been. The pizza was decent, the traditional pep was good and recommended.  As you chewed/ate more of a slice, it was as though the pizza wasn't cooked all the way, like borderline doughy.
Good Greek salad came back few days later and ordered it again. They used to add carrots and cucumbers but that was in 1997. And they use Romaine lettuce now not iceberg

Possibly the smallest wings I've ever seen.  Some the size of a pinky finger.

Staff were nice enough; and it's not their fault.  But the wings should be taken off the menu.  They are barely there.

Horrible value.

Cottage Inn is by far the best pizza around. I've never had a bad pizza there.

Just be aware if you're visiting this specific location: we always end up waiting another 10-20 minutes on top of our scheduled pickup time. I know that everyone is short staffed. And I'm definitely not complaining. Just trying to get the word out there.

Our pizza was hot and super fresh. Always made exactly how we want.

Cottage Inn has a great crust and excellent gormet pizza specialities. Standouts include the Price Buster, Chicken Mediterranean, and the Cuban. Some locations offer milkshakes and some good cheese bread options. A step above the national chains, especially in the non-Detroit style category. Lots of locations around town. The stadium location is super convenient on the west side of Ann Arbor. This location has a good sized dining area.

So, two friends and I had to make a trip up to Ann Arbor for a funeral this weekend and after being in the car for almost five hours, we decided just to order in. The concensus landed on pizza, because why not?! So instead of getting something from a larger chain, we opted for Cottage Inn. Let me just say that we were ECSTATIC we did! Happy pizza dances were had!

We did a split, round, medium pizza with breadsticks and two oreo shakes. The breadsticks are SO GOOD!! We're partial to soft, doughy, garlicky breadsticks so if you're not in that club, you won't like these. If you are, you'll LOVE them! The buttery goodness lifted our spirits.

For our pizza, we split half with pepperoni and feta, the other half sausage and onion, with mushrooms on the whole thang. The veggies are under the cheese, which was more than abundant and gooey and overall the topping ratio was impressive. Now, the shakes were a random move but turned out to be a great decision. I called ahead to see what the dirty shamrock consisted of, so if you're curious it's chocolate and mint. But yes, the shakes were delicious as well. If there were a Cottage Inn near us in Indianapolis, consider me a return customer.

We were staying at the Wyndham hotel nearby and our driver actually called to ensure he was able to find us. He delivered to our room! Which is such a small, but nice gesture that saved us some convenience. So big thank you to our driver for that extra effort.

Food can make or break your night and we were already having a rough one, so the fact that Cottage Inn delivered quickly and our order was not only accurate, but delicious made our night much better. 10/10 recommend.
This location is consistently FIRE! Never had a bad pizza from here. Never had an order made wrong. Wish you could sit down and get a pitcher though!
The young man that took my order was very nice and he also made my after work 12hrs Nino perfect.   Thanks man really appreciate it the all around great service… Kristina
